title: Voodoo Hill - Waterfall (2015)320ak
description:
Voodoo Hill - Waterfall (2015)320ak

The third release from the musical alliance between Italian axeman and
 producer Dario Mollo and legendary DEEP PURPLE bassist/vocalist Glenn Hughes is the culmination of a 30-plus-year career for Mollo as a musician, songwriter and producer.

Mollo's career started in 1981 with the heavy metal band CROSSBONES. He continued to develop his abilities with musical giants like Tony Martin (BLACK SABBATH), Graham Bonnet (RAINBOW, MSG), Don Airey (RAINBOW, OZZY OSBOURNE, DEEP PURPLE) and several others.

With the first VOODOO HILL album in 2000, Dario, had the chance to have a proper international release, 
"Waterfall" came about as a result "of the most prolific and creative period I had in my entire career," says Dario. "I wrote and recorded more than 35 song ideas in a very limited amount of time, leveraging from all the experiences I gathered as a guitar player, writer and producer. 
This creative phase had a further development when Dario Patti (keyboardist, bass player and orchestra arranger) came into the picture.
So I used very old school recording methods, including recording acoustic drums in rooms with natural reverb.
"He said Glenn Hughes was available,so the next thing I did was to choose the 11 songs which I thought suited the project the best. 
"Waterfall" is a strong and straightforward hard and heavy rock album which is equally split between aggressive and heavy moments and beautiful melodies.

"Waterfall" track listing:

01. All That Remains
02. The Well
03. Rattle Shake Bone
04. Underneath And Down Below
05. Waterfall
06. Karma Go
07. Evil Thing
08. Eldorado
09. White Feather
10. Sunflower
11. Last Door

The Players

Dario Mollo 	Guitars
See also: The Cage, Tony Martin, ex-Crossbones, Don Airey, ex-Electric Zoo
Dario Patti 	Keyboards
See also: Giuntini Project, The Cage, ex-Crossbones (live)
Glenn Hughes 	Vocals
See also: Iommi, Glenn Hughes, ex-Black Sabbath, ex-Deep Purple, ex-Erik Norlander, ex-Black Country Communion, ex-Brazen Abbot, ex-California Breed, ex-Finders Keepers, ex-Gary Moore, ex-Hughes Turner Project, ex-Hughes/Thrall, ex-L.A. Blues Authority, ex-Michael Men Project, ex-Trapeze, ex-Hank Davison (live), ex-Ken Hensley (live)
Andrea Maiellano 	Bass (2015-present)
Riccardo Vruna 	Drums (2015-present)
Vladimir Ruzicic Kebac 	Drums (2015-present)
